traits.Dive Attack: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.
traits.Simulacra: When a simulacrum drops to 0 hit points or is subjected to a successful dispel magic spell (DC 17+1d4 + 15), it reverts to ice and snow and is destroyed.
